00001 /*
00002  *******************************************************
00003  *              PLAY BACK SAMPLES FROM A BUFFER
00004  *******************************************************
00005  *              Tap.Tools Blue Object
00006  *              copyright © 2003 by Timothy A. Place
00007  *
00008  */
00009 
00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_BUFFER_PLAY_H
00012 #define TT_BUFFER_PLAY_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 #include "tt_buffer.h"
00017 //#include <functional>
00018 
00019 /********************************************************
00020         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00021 
00022         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00023  ********************************************************/
00024 
00025 class tt_buffer_play:public tt_audio_base{
00026 
00027         private:
00028                 // Function pointer for the DSP Loop (use this instead of branching for speed)
00029                 typedef void (tt_buffer_play::*FuncPtr)(tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *);
00030                 FuncPtr dsp_executor;
00031                 
00032                 // Attribute Values
00033                 tt_attribute_value_discrete     mode;
00034                 tt_attribute_value                              gain;
00035                 tt_buffer                                               *wavetable;             // Reference to an external buffer
00036         
00037         public:
00038                 enum selectors{                                                                         // Attribute Selectors
00039                         k_mode,
00040                                 k_mode_samples,
00041                                 k_mode_ms,
00042                                 k_mode_normalized,
00043                                 k_mode_normalized_fast,
00044                         k_gain,
00045                 };
00046                 
00047 
00048                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00049                 tt_buffer_play()                                                                        // Constructor          
00050                 {
00051                         wavetable = 0;
00052                         // set defaults
00053                         set_attr(k_mode, k_mode_normalized);
00054                         set_attr(k_gain, 0.0);
00055                         wavetable = 0;
00056                 }
00057 
00058                 tt_buffer_play(tt_buffer *mybuffer)                             // Constructor - BUFFER ARG
00059                 {
00060                         wavetable = 0;
00061                         // set defaults
00062                         set_attr(k_mode, k_mode_normalized);
00063                         set_attr(k_gain, 0.0);
00064                         wavetable = 0;
00065                         set_buffer(mybuffer);
00066                 }
00067 
00068                 ~tt_buffer_play()                                                                       // Destructor
00069                 {
00070                         ;
00071                 }
00072 
00073 
00074                 // ATTRIBUTES
00075                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00076                 {
00077                         switch (sel){
00078                                 case k_mode:    // mode sets a function pointer to the correct dsp loop
00079                                         mode = (tt_attribute_value_discrete)val;
00080                                         if(mode == k_mode_samples)
00081                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_buffer_play::dsp_vector_calc_samples;
00082                                         else if(mode == k_mode_ms)
00083                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_buffer_play::dsp_vector_calc_ms;
00084                                         else if(mode == k_mode_normalized)
00085                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_buffer_play::dsp_vector_calc_normalized;
00086                                         else if(mode == k_mode_normalized_fast)
00087                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_buffer_play::dsp_vector_calc_normalized_fast;
00088                                         break;
00089                                 case k_gain:
00090                                         gain = decibels_to_amplitude(val);
00091                                         break;
00092                         }
00093                 }
00094 
00095                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00096                 {
00097                         switch (sel){
00098                                 case k_mode:
00099                                         return mode;
00100                                 case k_gain:
00101                                         return amplitude_to_decibels(gain);
00102                                 default:
00103                                         return 0.0;
00104                         }
00105                 }
00106 
00107 
00108                 // METHODS
00109                 void set_buffer(tt_buffer *mybuffer)    // Set Buffer
00110                 {
00111                         wavetable = mybuffer;   
00112                 }
00113 
00114                 tt_buffer *get_buffer()                         // Get Buffer
00115                 {
00116                         return wavetable;
00117                 }
00118                 
00119 
00120                 /*****************************************************
00121                  * DSP LOOPS
00122                  *****************************************************/
00123                 
00124                 // Publically exposed interface for this object's dsp routine
00125                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00126                 {
00127                         (*this.*dsp_executor)(in, out);
00128                 }
00129 
00130         private:
00131                 // DSP LOOP: input is the location in samples
00132                 void dsp_vector_calc_samples(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00133                 {
00134                         unsigned long p1, p2;   
00135                         float diff;
00136                         double index;
00137                         float wavetable_length = float(wavetable->length_samples);
00138                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00139                                                                         
00140                     while(temp_vs--){
00141                                 // locate the play head, range check
00142                                 index = clip( *in->vector++, float(0), wavetable_length);
00143                                                                 
00144                                 // table lookup (linear interpolation)  
00145                                 p1 = (unsigned long)index;
00146                                 p2 = p1 + 1;
00147                                 diff = index - p1;      
00148                                 p2 &= ((wavetable->length_samples) - 1);        // fast modulo
00149                                                                                 
00150                         *out->vector++ = ((wavetable->contents[p2] * diff) + (wavetable->contents[p1] * (1.0 - diff))) * gain;
00151                     }
00152                     in->reset(); out->reset();
00153                 }
00154                 
00155                 // DSP LOOP: input is the location in ms
00156                 void dsp_vector_calc_ms(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00157                 {
00158                         int p1, p2;
00159                         float diff;
00160                         double index;
00161                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;       
00162                                                                         
00163                     while(temp_vs--){
00164                                 // locate the play head, range check
00165                                 index = clip((*in->vector++  * m_sr), 0.0f, float(wavetable->length_samples));
00166                                                                 
00167                                 // table lookup (linear interpolation)  
00168                                 p1 = (int)index;
00169                                 p2 = p1 + 1;
00170                                 diff = index - p1;      
00171                                 p2 &= ((wavetable->length_samples) - 1);        // fast modulo
00172                                                                                 
00173                         *out->vector++ = ((wavetable->contents[p2] * diff) + (wavetable->contents[p1] * (1.0 - diff))) * gain;
00174                     }
00175                     in->reset(); out->reset();
00176                 }
00177                 
00178                 // DSP LOOP: input is the location from 0 to 1
00179                 void dsp_vector_calc_normalized(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00180                 {
00181                         unsigned long p1, p2;
00182                         float diff, wavetable_length = (float)wavetable->length_samples;
00183                         double index;
00184                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00185                                                                         
00186                     while(temp_vs--){
00187                                 // locate the play head, range check
00188                                 index = clip(*in->vector++ * wavetable_length, 0.0f, wavetable_length);
00189                                                                 
00190                                 // table lookup (linear interpolation)  
00191                                 p1 = (unsigned long)index;
00192                                 p2 = p1 + 1;
00193                                 diff = index - p1;      
00194                                 p2 &= ((wavetable->length_samples) - 1);        // fast modulo
00195                                                                                 
00196                         *out->vector++ = ((wavetable->contents[p2] * diff) + (wavetable->contents[p1] * (1.0 - diff))) * gain;
00197                     }
00198                 }
00199                 
00200                 // DSP LOOP: input is the location from 0 to 1, NO INTERPOLATION, NO RANGE CHECK
00201                 void dsp_vector_calc_normalized_fast(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00202                 {
00203                         long index;
00204                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;                               
00205                     while(temp_vs--){
00206                                 // locate the play head, range check
00207                                 index = long(*in->vector++ * wavetable->length_samples);
00208                                                                 
00209                         *out->vector++ = wavetable->contents[index];
00210                     }
00211                 }
00212 };
00213 
00214 #endif  // tt_BUFFER_PLAY_H
